import React, { useState } from 'react'; function DTask() { const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState(''); const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([]); const handleChange = (event) => { setInputValue(event.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Create a new task object and add it to the tasks array const newTask = { text: inputValue, id: Date.now() }; setTasks([...tasks, newTask]); setInputValue(''); // Clear the input field after submission }; return (
